text: I was setting up a new instance of "FeedLand" and hit this surprising problem in node-emoji, which is used in the reallysimple package. Apparently the node-fetch package can no longer be accessed via a require. My work is stopped cold until this can be resolved, and I don't see how I can do anything on my end other than disabling emoji support in reallysimple as an emergency thing. Any help appreciated.
